Text: Grateful that @POTUS signed law naming Slatersville Post Office after fallen soldier Spc. Matthew Turcotte. Matthew enlisted in @USArmy while attending North Smithfield HS. He was killed in the line of duty in 2017. We will never forget his dedicated service to our nation. https://t.co/SLJ26jk2t7

Russia's illegal and immoral invasion shows yet again that Putin is motivated by nothing more than a self-serving desire to expand his authoritarian regime. The free world stands with the Ukrainian people.

The 100 Station Fire Victims. The 230 Injured. Survivors. Family. Friends. First Responders. February 20, 2003 feels like it was yesterday & the pain of that day will never go away. We remember, grieve, & honor those we lost. https://t.co/Me946GCMup

Extremists applauding the illegal Canadian trucking blockade are really just cheering the loss of American jobs and higher prices for working families and small businesses.  We need strong and fully operational supply chains, not clogged bridges, roads, and sick workers.

We must protect consumers from predatory lenders & ensure people have access to affordable loans that can help with crucial needs. Thanks to @aposner1984 @CGFund @ConsumerFed & community partners for critical work they do to invest in RI & create pathways to opportunity.

Supporting survivors shouldn’t be a partisan issue. Last year, we passed the #VOCAFix to ensure victims of crime receive financial assistance. Now, it's time to step up & renew #VAWA to prevent domestic violence & hold abusers accountable. https://t.co/odTlcnGNKB

I want to give a special congrats to Nicolle Greene of Holliman Elementary & Nicole Lemire of Samuel Slater Middle School for winning the @NSF Presidential Awards for Excellence in Mathematics and Science Teaching! #PAEMST

Teaching is never an easy profession.  It takes hard work, training, and commitment.  Covid has only made that more true. So thanks to all our amazing teachers, aides, librarians, administrators and principles.

Honoring a hometown hero: Congress just voted to name the Slatersville Post Office after fallen soldier Spc. Matthew Turcotte, who died in line of duty in 2017. Thanks to @davidcicilline @jimlangevin @SenWhitehouse for helping to enact this law to honor Matthew. https://t.co/Oky8PxVGa4

The health of our oceans is critical to the Ocean State. Pleased to meet w/ @rhodeislandsg @URIGSO - part of a nat'l network of 34 university-based & consortium programs - to discuss federal funding for ocean health, marine research, and coastal resilience. https://t.co/qSmmSnwxTY

Congrats to @Jorge_Zamanillo for being named the first director of @smithsonian Museum of the American Latino. I voted to help create this future museum to help educate, inspire, & showcase Latino contributions to art, history, & culture.
https://t.co/rODffARkgM

Thinking about Rosa Parks today on the anniversary of her birth (2/4/1913). Throughout her life, Rosa Parks stood tall for freedom, equality & justice. Rosa Parks is an American hero & her sacrifice led to a better future for all. #BlackHistoryMonth https://t.co/vjp3iSLNsH

Black History Month is a time for reflection, inspiration & celebration of the many profound achievements & contributions of Black Americans. Today we salute PVD native, musical prodigy & professor Dr. Raymond Jackson for uplifting Black composers & voices https://t.co/HNfU9UhNcz

As we continue digging out from the storm we must help RIers #KeepTheHeatOn. I delivered $52M in federal funding to help RI households in need w/ heating assistance. To see if you're eligible for LIHEAP, visit https://t.co/ge2m21AroL #NationalEnergyAssistanceDay

It’s impossible to comprehend the horrors of the #Holocaust – the scope of the inhumanity, evil, and #antisemitism. Yet, we must never forget & never be indifferent. This #HolocaustRemembranceDay we must all take a renewed stand against rising antisemitism in our communities. https://t.co/K7FgQkIG5X
On Justice Breyer’s retirement from SCOTUS: https://t.co/IUpSiKGgz9

I’m pleased to deliver federal investments that will help bring 1,500 new good-paying jobs to RI in 2022. Workers at @GDElectricBoat play a key role in strengthening U.S. security, keeping international commerce flowing, & deterring worldwide threats.
https://t.co/G6AbZjLU1b

Throughout pandemic, @liveunitedri & many more outstanding RI service organizations have worked overtime to help deliver care, compassion, & vital assistance. Pleased they are getting new $2M infusion to help feed the hungry, provide shelter to people in crisis, & so much more. https://t.co/V8J1ofyipt

Unfortunately, GOP-backed voter suppression is rampant in many states. While Senate Republicans blocked federal voting rights protections, the struggle for democracy continues. We will keep working to safeguard ballot access & ensure election integrity for ALL American voters.

This year’s @universityofri Rhode Island Food System Summit is online & brings together experts & innovators focused on sustainably growing RI’s food economy & improving our community food system. #RIFoodSummit22 Join the discussion: https://t.co/EFm7m7YHwm

Dr. King fought for our future - yours & mine. His vision for equal rights & a more just society changed history & the world. Today, we are called upon to do our part to prevent voter suppression. The U.S. Senate must act to protect voting rights & freedom for all!

Thank YOU, Jim, for your many years of principled leadership, friendship, dedicated service & for your many contributions to making RI and the world a better place!
https://t.co/ikID2eJeeg

I will continue working to ensure RI has everything it needs to combat COVID-19. Today, @HHSGov is deploying a 20-member team of medical professionals from the National Disaster Medical System to @KentHospital in #WarwickRI to help care for patients & overcome the Omicron surge.
Great to be with @AmeriCorps RI members & @davidcicille as local volunteers prepared 20,000 meals for delivery with the @FamilyServiceRI Be Safe Program. #MLKDay #DayofService https://t.co/wVd5TpqMWn

We honor MLK’s legacy with reverence, action, education, & service. Let us match his courage, follow his example, & pass voting rights legislation now to protect the freedom to vote for all Americans.
https://t.co/1SlRuMozad

This is a critical & much needed step toward safeguarding our elections from foreign malign influence. This office will help uncover, track & disrupt foreign interference against the U.S. & ensure a strong, coordinated response to better protect Americans.
https://t.co/SYtCeR3x2O

Starting next week (Jan. 19) you can request 4 FREE at-⁠home COVID-⁠19 tests that will be delivered to your door. No shipping costs, no financial info collected. Learn more & request your free test kits at official .gov site: https://t.co/XJVk7bT5Ss

We’ve got to build forward with an eye toward the future. Thanks to the Infrastructure Investment & Jobs Act I helped negotiate & pass, RI is getting an additional $47.1 million this year to upgrade bridges around the state & $235.5M for bridge improvements over the next 5 years.

Dr. Alexander-Scott served the people of Rhode Island well. Her dedication, expertise, and tireless work during COVID-19 pandemic were of incredible benefit to all RIers. We thank her for her service. She has my enduring gratitude and admiration.
https://t.co/i8HPhGZ8Bu

I strongly back @POTUS’s decision to deploy military medical teams to RI & other states to help w/ hospital staffing shortages amidst spike in omicron cases. This infusion of military health pros will bolster @RIHospital's ability to deliver full spectrum of care to all in need.

Dr. Maya Angelou was a civil rights leader, poet, professor, icon, & she continues to be an inspiration. Now, she's also the first Black woman to be featured on a U.S. quarter. I’m proud to have voted to help mint the American Women Quarters Program.
https://t.co/tdozINDvag

The need for climate action is urgent. New study shows severe weather disasters cost the U.S. $750 billion over the past 5 years. It’s time to pass Biden’s comprehensive climate policy agenda to help create green jobs & mitigate climate change.
https://t.co/JdRTAmTmKE

I created the Homeowners Assistance Fund to protect communities, strengthen economic recovery, & help homeowners impacted by COVID-19 catch up on mortgage & utility bills & remain safely housed. $50M is now available to assist RIers in need. Learn more: https://t.co/vUYAZMdqIf

Great to have @SenatorTester, Chairman of @SenateApprops Defense Subcommittee & @SECNAV in RI today for a firsthand look at emerging undersea technologies & advanced manufacturing capabilities. RI makes vital contributions to our nat'l defense & I'm proud of our talented workers.

At 12 noon I will join Senate colleagues in observing a moment of silence to mark one year since the January 6 insurrection. Soon after I will deliver a floor speech about the attack, investigation, & ongoing efforts to protect & strengthen our democracy. Tune in live on @cspan.

The Jan 6 assault on the US Capitol was an attack on democracy itself. Best way to defend U.S. against forces seeking to undermine our right to free, fair self-gov't is to transparently pursue the facts, ensure accountability, & uphold Constitutional principles that unite us all.

I am deeply saddened by the loss of Harry Reid, a great friend & champion for working families everywhere. He was equal parts caring, compassionate, competitive, & tenacious. His steady, persistent, unselfish leadership will continue to guide us & his example will sustain us.

Deeply saddened by the passing of Desmond Tutu. He inspired the world through his non-violent struggle against apartheid. His voice may now be silent, but his message & example live on & summon us to strive to be a force for good, to uplift others, & to seek justice, peace & joy.
Merry Christmas! https://t.co/CwELKz9Z0I

Late night wrapping presents & thinking of all the hard working moms and dads out there, past & present, who’ve given us so much. May the blessings of the season be upon you. May you be surrounded by hope, peace, joy & love. Merry Christmas to all & to all a good night!

Special thank you to our servicemen and women who are serving far from home tonight. And thank you to all the military families who make sacrifices for their loved ones & our nation. We are grateful for everything you do each and every day. #MerryChristmas

The holidays & coming new year offer a chance to reflect & focus on who and what is most important. Even amidst the challenges of #Omicron & #COVID, I know we’ll persevere. And we’ll continue our important work together to expand peace, hope, & opportunity in 2022!

As we gather with loved ones this week, don’t let the season of giving become the season of spreading COVID. Please take proper precautions to protect yourself & others. Have a merry Christmas, a #HealthyHoliday season & a happy #NewYear!

Thank you to our heroic health care workers who continue to work around the clock providing care & saving lives (often at risk to their own). We are so grateful to the doctors, nurses, support staff, researchers & everyone who helps care for patients & protect our communities.

Great to see federal housing funds at work building sustainable & innovative homes & addressing the housing affordability crisis in RI. I’m pleased to deliver $250K toward this effort & hope this project serves as a model for others. #housing #smallhomes https://t.co/pqyNOHfxNC
Free & fair elections are essential to our democracy. I agree with @SenatorWarnock. The U.S. Senate should stay in session and work through Christmas if need be to pass voting rights legislation.

As more folks do their holiday shopping online & more online retailers offer customers a “buy now, pay later” (#BNPL) option that could pose unsuspecting risks to some consumers, I'm urging @CFPB to strengthen oversight & keep up w/ growth of BNPL products & providers. https://t.co/yJ05PkbbXq

800,000 is a grim milestone & we mourn every single one of them. You can do your part to help protect others & prevent future loss of life: Please get a booster & encourage others to do the same. We are all in this together.
https://t.co/lQOBl0B8lb

We can never forget the 20 innocent first graders & 6 selfless adults who were gunned down in Newtown, CT nine years ago. And we can’t stop working to prevent gun violence & make our schools safer. We need #gunsense laws. #endgunviolence #SandyHook https://t.co/FgnsdEPjFE

It was great to be at dedication of the Johnston Police Chief Richard S. Tamburini Public Safety Complex yesterday. It’s a fitting tribute to an officer and a gentleman (& RI Criminal Justice Hall of Famer!) who served and protected w/ integrity & distinction for over 5 decades. https://t.co/FQmeeV4xqa
It’s game day. Gearing up for the greatest rivalry game in college football. #GoArmy #BeatNavy #SingSecond

Our hearts are with our friends in south and central states who’ve been impacted by these deadly tornadoes & extreme weather. Devastation is staggering. Federal gov’t is helping with emergency response & we will be there to help rebuild & recover. https://t.co/50uMFXqpQw
Sec. Walsh has the right idear. And he knows booster rhymes with Worcester. https://t.co/u7WECTHbda

Some say 'booster,' others pronounce it 'boost-ah.' Either way, it protects you & those closest to you. So please roll up your sleeve & get your free COVID booster shot. It could save your life or someone else's. Thank you!

Parents know COVID has stressed them, students, and educators. The EDUCATORS for America Act delivers short-term & long-term solutions. It will help improve schools & build a strong educator pipeline to better recruit, train, support & retain effective teachers & educators.

CONFIRMED: Today, the full U.S. Senate confirmed Zachary A. Cunha to be the next U.S. Attorney for Rhode Island. @SenWhitehouse & I are proud to have recommended him and support his nomination.  We know he will serve the people of Rhode Island with integrity and distinction.

Climate change poses a serious threat to U.S. financial institutions. Regulators need to follow FSOC’s Climate Report with action. I led a letter with 10 colleagues urging financial regulators to strengthen climate-related risk management. https://t.co/sCtKd58JcF

“December 7, 1941 -- a date which will live in infamy.” Today marks the 80th anniversary of the attack on #PearlHarbor and we join in solemn remembrance of those we lost & honor the courage of those who answered the call. https://t.co/o2UKBlVF4v

College is expensive.  On Wednesday, 12/7, @ 6:30pm, please join my college financial workshop aid workshop for expert advice from @CPCRI, @RIStudentLoan & RISocietyofCPAs b/c families & HS students deserve help with the #FAFSA. https://t.co/R4Y4LPH86o

A strong #blueeconomy means more jobs & biz in the Ocean State.  @401TechBridge @NUWCNewport @URI_BEC @CommerceRI @SenWhitehouse & I are working to advance blue tech innovation by helping entrepreneurs, startups, & companies build partnerships & bring new products to market. https://t.co/jOpNbjoX8i

As a soldier, statesman, and an advocate for veterans and people with disabilities, Bob Dole defined the very best of what it means to be a public servant. It was an honor to work with him over the years on a variety of issues, & I salute his remarkable service. https://t.co/IRnVLrFiQt

Delivering $2.1M to @farmfreshri to boost local farmers markets, promote #RIseafood, & expand successful produce program to encourage healthy eating. These new federal funds will expand economic opportunities for farmers & fishermen & beef up RI's healthy food supply chain. https://t.co/ipdSSnG5sV
Heading over to @farmfreshri food hub this morning at #10SimsAve. Should be a fruitful trip! #LocalFood #EatLocal #ShopLocal #FarmersMarket #HealthyFoodForAll #SNAPMatters #FreshProduce
Wishing a happy first night of #Hanukkah to all who are beginning their celebrations this evening!

Great to be with the West Warwick Veterans Council, American Legion Post 2, & local leaders in #WestWarwickRI this morning for a special Veterans Square flag raising ceremony & dedication of new flagpole. We salute our veterans & honor them each & every day. https://t.co/olH0Ss8Lx9

Happy #Thanksgiving! I hope your table is filled with great food, family, & friends. May we take time to count our many blessings & offer a helping hand to those in need. Special thanks to those who serve others & help safeguard our nation. We keep you in our hearts always. https://t.co/itgLcyM5Dx

Thanks to @AmosHouse staff & volunteers (including awesome team from @grannysquibb) for serving up a #Thanksgiving feast to those in need & ensuring everyone has a welcoming place at our community table. https://t.co/0WwNsOY6F3

Looking forward to seeing my friends @AmosHouse. I’m thankful for the kindness, caring, community & hospitality Amos House provides. In addition to feeding the hungry, Amos House offers life-changing training & support. It’s truly a place of hope & warmth. https://t.co/vnGl7qowYb

In this season of togetherness & gratitude, I’m thankful for how far we’ve come in the fight against COVID & mindful that COVID is still a threat. As we prepare to gather with friends & family, please be COVID-safe so we may give thanks together & help protect our loved ones.

Supporting small businesses has a big impact on our economy. Today, I joined @SBA_RhodeIsland, EG Chamber, @RIHospitality @SenWhitehouse @JimLangevin @davidcicilline in #EastGreenwich to promote upcoming #SmallBizSat & encourage RIers to #ShopSafe & #ShopLocal this weekend. https://t.co/k4Sz8FWCJh

President Biden’s decision to tap 50 million barrels of crude from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve & work with other nations to lower oil prices is a smart, coordinated move that will provide a real measure of relief for Americans at the gas pump & help bolster our economy.
Getting set to introduce @SecYellen for a wide ranging conversation on U.S. economic outlook at @Provchamber’s annual meeting, which is being held virtually this year.

Great to join @RIPTA_RI, @SenWhitehouse & @davidcicilline to announce $900,000 federal grant to study a high-capacity transit corridor from Central Falls to Warwick aia Providence. This funding will help RI achieve state’s vision for better #PublicTransit connections. https://t.co/OzLNWWGCmE

I strongly back @POTUS’ nominees to lead @federalreserve. Chair Powell & Dr. Brainard are powerful choices who bring experience, data-driven expertise, & future-oriented skills to the job. They will lead the Fed forward with wisdom, independence, and steady leadership.

Gas prices are too high. Good on @POTUs for demanding regulators crack down on possible anti-competitive behavior by big oil & gas companies that unfairly harm consumers at the pump. Prices won’t drop overnight, but data & insight from this investigation could be a game-changer.

Expanding COVID-19 booster shots for all adults is a smart way to combat COVID. Fully vaccinated people are less likely to get sick & also less likely to widely spread virus to others. Getting booster offers the strongest protection available & is best bet for ending pandemic.

Proud to work w/ @SenWhitehouse @JimLangevin @davidcicilline to deliver $81.7M in federal funding to build RI a new state-of-the-art health laboratory. This new lab will replace outdated facility & provide improved services to address current & future health/enviro threats.

PARENTS! TODAY is the deadline to sign up for the advance #ChildTaxCredit in 2021. Families can get thousands of $$$ to help them make ends meet & afford everyday necessities. I want every eligible RIer to get this tax cut b/c they earned it. Learn more: https://t.co/77fnVt9YvW

Too many people's lives have been cut short by cancer. But thanks to @ACSCAN & federal research, more RIer’s have access to quality cancer care, treatment & support services. Congrats to @MaryellenGoodwin & @MiaForRep on their National Distinguished Advocacy Awards! https://t.co/vLbyeVl8Jd

Our veterans understand there is unity and strength in diversity. They come from different generations, regions, backgrounds, races, religions & branches of service. But all are bound by shared values & a sacred oath to defend & uphold the Constitution. https://t.co/rpDm9b6JyD

Joined @BrownUniversity’s Veterans Day salute to past & current servicemembers as well as ROTC cadets who are training for a career in the military and will lead our nation forward as the next generation of commissioned officers. https://t.co/dOfpS3YiOu

This #VeteransDay we honor & salute veterans of all ages whose courage, contributions, and sacrifices have protected & sustained the United States across generations. We are grateful to those who serve & care for our vets, on Veterans Day & every day. https://t.co/3sdg7Z9ep0

For years there was empty talk about #InfrastructureWeek. Biden & Dems listened & acted. Now we’re delivering billions of new federal $$$ to improve RI's roads, bridges, #publictransit, water, #cleanenergy, #broadband & more. This jobs bill = better commutes & less pollution.

Everything pairs better with a clean environment. Including wine! Cheers to Verde Vineyards in #JohnstonRI for blending old-world wine making & clean, renewable energy technology at their award-winning vineyard! Thanks for today's tour. RI is #winecountry! https://t.co/tskmksLNT1

I will always look up to Max Cleland. While we mourn his passing today, we are grateful for Max’s leadership & will continue to mark April 8 as his #AliveDay. Because although the grenade took Max’s arm & legs that day, it never stopped his big-hearted passion for service.

Tourism is a big part of RI economy. Fought for and won $10.6 million to help RI’s tourism industry as part of the #AmericanRescuePlan. #delivering
https://t.co/hozb8M0Tbm

For decades, everyone said our national #infrastructure was falling behind. President Biden and Dems listened and delivered a historic law that invests in our future and creates real jobs now, reduces pollution and congestion, & strengthens U.S.

Training workers for in-demand jobs and connecting them to employers who are hiring & paying good wages is key to economic growth and building a stronger middle-class. RI is showing how it can be done.
https://t.co/VeMztGw5i3

RI is leading the way in building a new pipeline of skilled workers for in-demand jobs. Thx to @USDOL’s @SecMartyWalsh for visiting #WarwickRI today to get a firsthand look at collaborative #workforcedev between @GDElectricBoat @CCRINews @NEInstituteTech @RI_DLT @SENEDIA_. https://t.co/BSvMbxC3kn
Hope you have a happy, safe & #WickedAwesome #Halloween! https://t.co/XeDZuvLJdg

RI is a leader when it comes to #workforcedevelopment. Pleased to welcome @USDOL's @SecMartyWalsh to RI on Monday & show off some of the ways we're building a new generation of submarine shipbuilders who are in turn building #nextgen subs that help safeguard the nation.

Joined @SBA_NewEngland & @CWEtalk in visiting Operation Made in #WarwickRI to do some pre-holiday shopping, visit w/ amazing #Veterepreneurs & help support veteran-owned businesses. Next week is #NationalVeteranSmallBusinessWeek - a great time to #ShopLocal & support #VetBiz. https://t.co/n2wQKLQRCP

This #BreastCancerAwarenessMonth I’m continuing the fight to:
-Fund breakthrough #cancerresearch to #StopBreastCancerNow
-Ensure every American can afford to see their doctor & get life-saving care
-Remind folks to be proactive, get a #mammogram, & take charge of your health. https://t.co/Kh9NMt01qV

Today, on the 3rd anniversary of the #TreeOfLife synagogue #massshooting in PA, I’m thinking about the innocent victims who were killed & injured. About the justice yet to be served. And about the collective work that lies ahead to prevent anti-Semitism, hate, & gun violence.

The weather outside is frightful! Severe storm watch with potential for heavy rain, flooding, & dangerous wind gusts this evening & early tomorrow. Please be careful out there & stay safe.
https://t.co/djE1S4bFSN

Honored to welcome #Colombian Ambassador @PinzonBueno of @ColombiaEmbUSA to discuss bilateral cooperation & partnership in matters of security, economic development, & more. Nuestros países comparten una amistad fuerte y duradera. https://t.co/5irMMhbn7X

The COVID #vaccine is safe & effective & it's key to defeating the pandemic. Thanks to the 90% of RIers who've done the right thing to protect themselves & others. Hope more people will have the courage to join them. We're all in this together!
https://t.co/6Vs4sKe0Xe

This week is #NationalLeadPoisoningPreventionWeek & a reminder that #leadpoisoning prevention, detection, & remediation is key. Today I joined @CCAPORG, @LeadSafeKidsRI, @HUDgov @RIHousing & more to call for enhanced federal support & investments for #LeadFreeKids. #NLPPW21 https://t.co/KFpu26TBxn

Colin Powell was the epitome of selfless service, courageous leadership, and uncompromising integrity. He will be remembered as one of our nation’s very finest military and diplomatic leaders. I join RIers & Americans everywhere in mourning his loss.
https://t.co/IXC5qfT5B8

Ray Sullivan died too young. But he lived a full life -- a life filled with family, friends, & purpose -- a life that uplifted & empowered countless others. We will sorely miss his kindness & passion. We can honor him by trying to help others the way Ray did his whole life.

Joined @MariaForCF @DanMcKeeRI @SenWhitehouse @Davidcicilline & others to celebrate new federal grants for @CentralFalls_RI, including public safety funds for new ambulances, police cruisers, fire dept. vehicles, training, & other investments. https://t.co/uY4kqOvkBK

Ray Odierno served with great distinction. His courageous & inspired leadership in so many demanding jobs leaves me with great admiration & thanks for his extraordinary service. He is one of the great commanders of his, or any other, generation of American military leaders.

Two brothers - Robert (Navy) & Anthony (Army) Finelli – from Providence, both honorably served in uniform during the 1950s. Although they are no longer with us, we are grateful for their service. Today, I salute them & proudly presented their family with the medals they earned. https://t.co/IRYytJSmmZ

I'm proud to deliver $3M to enhance freight capacity at @QuonsetRI. A better port with improved rail service means more jobs for RI & it also helps reduce pollution & congestion on our roadways. https://t.co/uGsrakC35r

Thank you to the patriotic students, teachers & staff of @JLMcCourtMS for having me at today’s #FlagRaising! So impressed by the unity, spirit, and community pride of these talented young people. https://t.co/zmnZ7eKFhv

#SaveMoney = #CutPollution = #CreateJobs these are my reasons for co-chairing the Renewable Energy and Energy Efficiency Caucus. We need to continue to work together to cut energy waste on National Energy Efficiency Day and every day! #EEDay2021

Without the right to vote there’s no democracy. The power of the vote is under threat as some places try to codify voter suppression. The John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act (#VRAA) will restore equal #votingrights for all & ensure every vote is fairly & accurately counted.

Honored to speak at christening ceremony for USS Carl M. Levin. “Tenacious in the Fight” is both a fitting motto for this formidable vessel & an apt description of Sen. Levin’s leadership & unrelenting advocacy for the people of Michigan & the men and women of the U.S. military. https://t.co/JCxCwFQwyf

Happy #ManufacturingMonth.  Ever since Samuel Slater built his first mill, #MFG has created jobs, promoted innovation & moved our economy forward. To sustain our global leadership & critical supply chains, we must invest in innovation & support domestic manufacturers. https://t.co/9mXrsZChD7

I am proud to continue Sen. Pell's legacy and help lead the fight to #DoublePell grants to help more students & #workingfamilies afford to pay for college. Doubling Pell grants will expand opportunity, strengthen our communities, & help grow our economy.
Every day is #NationalCoffeeDay. Rhode Islanders also celebrate #NationalIcedCoffeeDay in months that end in R, Y, H & L. And sometimes in June too. https://t.co/n60B2iyMZq

Tonight, Congressional Republicans voted in favor of shutting down the federal government, undermining the economy, & jeopardizing the full faith & credit of the United States. That’s irresponsible & the American people deserve better.

Gaetano Faraone's 40+ years of honorable service in @USAirForce & RI Air National Guard took him all over the world, including Europe & Africa. Happy 90th anniversary to my favorite airport, @IFlyRhodeIsland. Aviation has changed a lot over the last 90 years & the airport has been a key economic generator for the state. I'll continue working to improve the airport & ensure it serves RIers well into the future. #PVD90 https://t.co/ynm71oy3Dr

We need to find a cure for Alzheimer’s.  While working to achieve that goal, we also need to focus on therapies & improving health care & quality of life for people living with Alzheimer’s. As we celebrate #HispanicHeritageMonth, we recognize the many achievements & contributions #Latinas & #Latinos have made to RI & our nation. Learn more about the significance of National Hispanic American Heritage Month & how you can join the celebration: https://t.co/zEjRkko2UF
To all my Jewish friends observing #YomKippur, I hope you and your loved ones have a meaningful fast and reflection #GmarChatimaTova

Great art & music can change the world. George Wein was an American original. He produced the soundtrack of freedom for a generation of Americans & gifted us @newportfolkfest @newportjazzfest. His spirit & musical legacy live on! https://t.co/JcMS46my15

Our #infrastructure is key to economic growth. I’m proud to help pass bipartisan Senate bill that would steer over $1.7 billion to RI highways, roads & bridges over the next five years. It also invests in our #transit systems, #airports, #ports, #railways, tech. & #cleanwater. https://t.co/BD90uJDJrH
We remember. #September11 https://t.co/qGKjX9NkTe

20 years later and we remember it like it was yesterday. Still mourn for those we lost. As we reflect on the horrific tragedy of #September11, we also salute those who risked everything to help others & we must summon the spirit of unity to build a brighter future. #NeverForget https://t.co/KiltThVe6f

Here at @ChezPascal discussing $28.6B #RestarauntRevitalizationFund to help local eateries & bars. #EatLocal #401Love https://t.co/GfWEcnTkSc

It’s official: Congress just passed the #AmericanRescuePlan! It offers big, bold relief for the American people & communities. Lots of numbers in the bill, but the one that’s on my mind is 527,000+ of our fellow Americans who’ve been killed by COVID-19. We keep them in our❤️'s.

If you've been working overtime to help out with school work at home, as well educational tech. support, then you will appreciate the #AmericanRescuePlan. It’s going to help get kids safely back into classrooms & help ensure everyone, including teachers, can get vaccinated ASAP.

The worldwide struggle for gender equality continues. Too many women remain without access to equal rights & freedom under the law. This #InternationalWomensDay, we must #choosetochallenge inequality & fight for opportunity&inclusion for all women & girls in U.S. & across the 🌎.

Also proud to help deliver $750M from the #AmericanRescuePlan to help #MealsOnWheels continue serving those in need nationwide. https://t.co/WJjeAyMDXQ

The #AmericanRescuePlan will:
✅ Put money in people’s pockets. 
✅ Boost vaccines & get more life-saving doses into people’s arms.
✅ Safely reopen schools.
✅ Get people working again & help Main St. businesses survive.
✅ Deliver overdue aid to states & communities nationwide.
